summary.span: 定义到控件适配器的接口。

span.span: Defines the interface to a control adapter.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有控件适配器必须都实现接口。All control adapters must implement the interface. 通常情况下，控件适配器直接或间接继承从基类，提供此接口的默认实现。Usually, a control adapter inherits directly or indirectly from the base class, which provides a default implementation of this interface.

permission.span: 用于在宿主环境中进行操作。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.

span.span: Name of the event.

summary.span: 如果已处理事件，则返回 。

span.span: Returns if the event was handled.

summary.span: 此 API 已过时。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

returns.span: 如果处理了回发事件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the postback event was handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接收回发事件通知，检查事件是否为特定的适配器时，将由控件调用此方法。This method is called by a control when it receives a postback event notification, to check whether the event is adapter specific. 如果该控件实现，并接收回发事件，调用的控件适配器的方法。If the control implements and receives a postback event, the method of the control adapter is called. 如果向控件发送的事件而异的目标设备，必须调用此方法的控件实现控件适配器的方法。If events sent to the control can vary depending on the target device, the control implementation of this method must call the method of the control adapter. 此方法返回`true`或`false`，以指示设备适配器是否已处理该事件。This method returns `true` or `false`, indicating whether the device adapter handled the event. 它将返回`false`默认情况下。It returns `false` by default.

value.span: 控件中单独一项的近似权重。

span.span: The approximate weight of a single item in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值为`-1`指示，必须使用该元素的默认权重。A value of `-1` indicates that the default weight for the element must be used. 将继承的类必须重写此属性。The inheriting class must override this property. 有关重写此属性的详细信息，请参阅[分页](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2)。For further information about overriding this property, see [Pagination](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件的实现调用此方法接口都具有其自己调用方法。This method is called when a control that implements the interface has its own method invoked. > [!NOTE] > 不同的设备可能以不同的方式提供其数据返回到调用的服务器。Different devices might provide their data back to the calling server in different ways. 一个示例是 WML 和 HTML 报告的方式返回的结果之间的差异。An example is the difference between how WML and HTML report back the results of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以重写此方法以设置特定于设备的属性。You can override this method to set device-specific properties. 继承的类可以重写此方法以执行其他任务。Inheriting classes can override this method to perform other tasks. 如果在继承类中重写此方法，则必须调用基实现。If this method is overridden in an inheriting class, you must call the base implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于窗体分页。This property is used for form pagination. 值为`-1`指示，必须使用该元素的默认权重。A value of `-1` indicates that the default weight for the element must be used. 有关详细信息，请参阅[分页支持](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78F2786D-0B5B-4760-9616-5027357713C2)。For further information, see [Pagination Support](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78F2786D-0B5B-4760-9616-5027357713C2).
